member.summary: The value provided for argument '{argumentName}' must be a valid value of enum type '{enumType}'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.InvalidSchemaQualifiedName(System.Object)
member.summary: The schema qualified name '{name}' is invalid. Schema qualified names must be of the form [<schema_name>.]<object_name>.

member.summary: Can not create a ModificationFunction for an entity in state '{entityState}'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.UpdateConcurrencyException(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Update failed. Expected {expectedRows} row(s) but {actualRows} row(s) returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.MultipleDataStoresConfigured
member.summary: Multiple relational data store configurations found. A context can only be configured to use a single data store.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.NoDataStoreConfigured
member.summary: No relational data stores are configured. Configure a data store using OnConfiguring or by creating an ImmutableDbContextOptions with a data store configured and passing it to the context.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.ConnectionAndConnectionString
member.summary: Both an existing DbConnection and a connection string have been configured. When an existing DbConnection is used the connection string must be set on that connection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.NoConnectionOrConnectionString
member.summary: A relational store has been configured without specifying either the DbConnection or connection string to use.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.UnsupportedType(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: The property '{propertyName}' cannot be mapped because it is of type '{propertyType}' which is currently not supported.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.RelationalNotInUse
member.summary: Relational-specific methods can only be used when the context is using a relational data store.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.UpdateStoreException
member.summary: An error occurred while updating the entries. See the inner exception for details.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.TransactionAlreadyStarted
member.summary: The connection is already in a transaction and cannot participate in another transaction.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.TransactionAssociatedWithDifferentConnection
member.summary: The specified transaction is not associated with the current connection. Only transactions associated with the current connection may be used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Relational.Strings.SkipNeedsOrderBy
member.summary: A query containing the Skip operator must include at least one OrderBy operation.
